section.title: Software (*)
section.para:
To build transformation systems using Stratego/XT you need the following software packages:
ATerm Library: term representation
SDF2 Bundle: SDF2 parser generator and parser
Stratego/XT: Stratego compiler and XT tools
Stratego Shell: Stratego interpreter
This section explains where to get these packages and how to install them on your own machine using a variety of deployment methods.

section.title: Deployment Methods
section.para: The Stratego/XT distribution, its dependencies and applications are deployed using a number of different methods, ranging from distribution through Nix channels, binary packages for package management systems such as RPM, and source distributions.
